gatewayTimestamp.description: Timestamp upon receipt at the gateway. If present, this property will be overwritten by the gateway; submitters are not intended to populate this property.

message.description: Contains all properties from the codex event in the client's journal minus Localised strings and the properties marked below as 'disallowed'

entryID.description: Required EventID for the codex entry

system.description: Should be in the Journal Event

body.description: Must be added if Codex event is body based

region.description: Should be in the Journal Event

systemAddress.description: Should be in the Journal Event

name.description: Should be in the Journal Event

category.description: Should be in the Journal Event

subCategory.description: Should be in the Journal Event

latitude.description: Not included in the event, should be added by the sender if present in status.json

longitude.description: Not included in the event, should be added by the sender if present in status.json
